TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 884
TEI.2.document_title: Anthony Butler to Stephen F Austin, 11-06-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Anthony Butler to Austin, November 6, 1832. Draft for $21.87 1/2
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 884

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Anthony Butler to Austin, November 6, 1832. Draft for $21.87 1/2*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Will please pay *person_mentioned*John Brown*/person_mentioned* or order twenty one dollars 87 1/2 for brick received of him for *person_mentioned*Col Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned*s use*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*by *person_mentioned*Jno R Jones*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="11-06-1832">Nov 6 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*'s Acceptce. $21.87 1/2*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Brown*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Recd. Payment *date_mentioned n="11-06-1832">Nov. 6, 183*/date_mentioned*2*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*N. TOWNSEND*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
